attributes.action: Reduce the volume of the music played at the Coventry Godiva Festival so that is doesn’t effect the local residents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Year after year Coventry City Council fails to take into consideration the opinions of the people living locally to the Memorial Park and allows festival organisers to get away with blasting the area with loud bass music.
I do not want the festival banned I just want it to go back to being a enjoyable festival for all.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
